about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Hi, I'm Here To Help Your Next Project
about.description: I am a Full-Stack developer with .Net, having 2 years of professional experience since 2023. I have participated in the design, development, and migration of enterprise systems, specializing in web financial applications, applying agile methodologies (Scrum) to ensure the rapid and efficient delivery of software solutions. I possess skills to solve complex problems and effectively self-manage during independent projects, as well as collaborate efficiently as part of a team.

current_role.title: Software Developer at Sifizsoft S.A
responsibilities: Participated in the migration of the Enterprise Financial System to a web application, increasing system efficiency by 25%.
Developed complex features and performed automated testing, ensuring software quality at 98%.
Programmed updates based on detailed design specifications, improving system stability by 15%.
Worked independently and as an enthusiastic team member, collaborating under a DevOps approach to ensure continuous delivery and scalability of applications.
Provided support and maintenance for incidents in APIs, web, and mobile applications.
Programmed new views and functionalities in mobile applications.
